heading: In rem jurisdiction over the building
text:
In rem jurisdiction over the building, structure, or premises where the
     violation shall exist shall be complete by affixing the summons to the door of the building, structure, or premises and by
     mailing the summons by certified or registered mail, return receipt requested, to one of the owners of some part of or interest in
     the building, structure, or premises. Proof of service shall be filed within two days thereafter with the clerk of the court
     designated in the summons. Service shall be complete upon such filing.
